author: perezhilton
title: Emma Watson Is Charming AF Giving Strangers Advice For $2 — Watch!
text:
Emma Watson is a flawless human being!
Vanity Fair 's Derek Blasberg teamed up with the Beauty and the Beast actress to hand out advice to willing commuters at New York's Grand Central Terminal for the low, low price of $2!!
Related: This Beauty And The Beast Character Is Totally Gay! 
The starlet and staunch feminist joined in via FaceTime to dish her best responses, and we're pretty sure she couldn't be more adorable.
And as for the profit they made from all the advice?? It's getting donated to Planned Parenthood !!
She really is amazing! Watch (above)! 
Tags: advice , amazing , beauty and the beast , derek blasberg , emma watson , girl power , vanity fair
